## DELETE\_ORGANIZATION\_MUTATION variable

The DELETE\_ORGANIZATION\_MUTATION is used to delete the organization. The mutation validates the user, wheather the user is admin or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DELETE_ORGANIZATION_MUTATION: import("graphql").DocumentNode
```

## Remarks

This mutation is declared in talawa-API. Documentation for this mutation can find [here](https://github.com/PalisadoesFoundation/talawa-api/blob/develop/lib/resolvers/organization_mutations/removeOrganization.js)
